Text:

hes over rated and not funny

i thaught it was a good show however some of his jokes where taken from karl pilkington, like the one about sending a goat to africa as a christmas present. also does this come with the extra footage. 

karl is a genius and if you dont know about him check out the ricky gervais guide to series.

BillyBob - yeah, apparently most useless cunts don't understand Ricky's comedy.  But then again, useless cunts don't really understand anything except how to be useless and a cunt.  
Go watch Dane Cook - you'll like him, he's a useless cunt too.
